subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Carl Pettersson won his hometown event for his first PGA Tour victory in two years, shooting a two-under 68 in the Wyndham Championship in Greensboro, N.C.
snippet: Carl Pettersson won his hometown event for his first PGA Tour victory in two years, shooting a two-under 68 in the Wyndham Championship in Greensboro, N.C.
